Question: Atlas Aerospace Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gentex Corporation

Product 1

- PLACE Smart Smoke/CO Detection with room-specific functionality and user-friendly app
- ADASKY Thermal Imaging for automotive industry with LWIR sensors for enhanced passenger and pedestrian safety
- Driver and In-Cabin Monitoring system for distraction, drowsiness, and semi-autonomous vehicles
- Digital Vision with Full Display Mirror (FDM) for enhanced rearward visibility and improved nighttime performance
- Dimmable Glass technology for automotive and aerospace sectors with on-demand darkening capabilities
- Aerospace solutions including electronically dimmable windows (EDWs), passenger smart-lighting, and biometric systems
- eSight wearable assistive technologies for people with visual impairments

For more information, visit www.gentex.com.
